TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ci-lung-puo, title = Ci-lung-puo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ci-lung-puo} }

S.FORM: == Ci-lung-puo 吉隆坡 == Ci-lung-puo itida i Ma-lay-si-ya pangkiw a subalan nutipan a sadipasan,u Sye-lan-e-cuo a liklik. Ci-lung-puo papikenihen tu "Ci-lung-puo len-pan ce-sya kitidaan", u Ma-lay-si-ya tuluay a len-pan nu ce-sya kitidaan, u Ma-lay-si-ya len-pan sihu midui tu len-pan ce-sya ku mikuwanay. Ci-lung-puo naw len-pan sihu nu tatelungan atu Ma-lay-si-ya len-pan huing nu kitidaan, nika i caysiwsiwsiw mihcaan malimad taydan i Ci-lung-puo timulan nu tusep a kunli nu Pu'-cen. . ayda nu Ma-lay-si-ya a lunem nu len-pan sihuan a tapang, sepat tu ku liwan itida i Ci-lung-puo. Kanahatu mahini, Ci-lung-puo u Ma-lay-si-ya kuo-huy atu kanatal hung-kun a kitidaan. nika hidaan, kitakid nu cacay a bataan nu tabakiay a cacakayan nu tuluay, hekal nu satalakaway a Sung-ce-ta i Kuo-yiw-sung-fun-ta, hekal nu sakatusa a talakaway i Muo-ti-ka caycaywal atu Ma-lay-si-ya kupiaw cacakayan itida tu i labu nu Ci-lung-puo. . likisi 歷史 katukuh ayda nai' henay ku tatengaan i tini i likisian cimaay hekiya ku patidengan atu panganganay tu Ci-lung-puoan. Ci-lung-puo sayaway naitida i Sung-si-e-may atu Sung-si-pa-sen a nikalalitemuhan, nu pinaay nu lalumaan atu patiyamay a niyadu'an. Ci-lung-puo hakiya i caywallimpic mihcaan malamacimacian, tawyaay nu Pa-sen a Ma-lay tumuk ci La-ze-a-pu-tu-la itida i sabaan nida ci La-ze-cu-ma-an a nipadangan awdan nida ku namakayniay i Lu-ku a tademaw taydan i Pa-sen mikutkut tu sikung, ya kakutkutan malatataydaan tu papacakayan. nu taydaay mikutkut a tademaw i Ci-lung-puo kakilukilul sa tayda hida satu a siluma' i An-pan, tida satu mikaykun tu pitahawan tu kakutkutan. Ci-lung-puo u Pa-sen sauwac pabaw nu sabataday a kitidaan, sakalihalay pakacaw i balungan tu tuudan, sisa kapulungan nu si-kung. Tinipicuduhan nu nipikutkutan tu si-kung, buwah satu ku Ci-lung-puo yadah tu ku nipisangan tu dadanan. . lalangaw nalimaan文化 藝術 Ci-lung-puo u Ma-lay-si-ya tatelungan nu lalangawan. Ma-lay-si-ya kanatal puo-u-kun itida i Ci-lung-puo sakacacay nu dadanan, ilabu yadah ku nipisingan tu namakacuwacuwaay a nalimaan atu nikulitan. Ma-lay-si-ya Yi-se-lan lalangawan puo-u-kun pitu a malebut nu pina ku nipisingan tu Yi-se-la a tuudan caay kaw nikasingaan tu nu Cung-tun a nalimaan, pasu namaka Ya-cuo nu dumaan a nalimaan, pasu Cung-kuo atu Tung-nan-ya. nika hida , Ci-lung-puo idaw ku pina a puo-u-kan ku patinangkay tu nitenunan a tuudan, kaysing, mukin a sangan atu nitenunan tu dikucan. . mahiniay a puo-u-kun u mutidengan a wayway ku patinakuan tu nupunsi a nitenunan, kaysing, mukin a nalimaan atu nitenuna tu tuudan a hican misanga, likisi, gigicu atu nalimaan a tuudan. Hung-cya-sye-lan-e itida i Ci-lung-puo idaw ku tatelungan nu sasalamaan, taydaay midang nu tademaw taneng makayda i Hung-cya-sye-lan-e a Si-puo-u-kun, kakulitan atu kakulian micumud miadih. taneng ku taydaay midang nu tademaw i Hung-cya-sye-lan-e si pisakakawawan a "The School of Hard Knocks" cacudadan minanam tu laylay a tuudan atu hicaen misangan tu nu udip a si nu sangaan. "The School of Hard Knocks" . Ci-lung-puo sakasingangan nu aadihan tu migikiay itida i Kuo-yiw-sung-fung-ta sasa a Ma-lay-si-ya Kuo-yiw dadatukan, hina taydaay a masakaputay nu midatukay u namakacuwacuwaay nu kitakidan a mudatukay nu masakaputy a Ma-lay-si-ya Ay-ye-ye-tun "MPO", idaw ku paytem nu demiadan itida sikawaw tu midatukay atu dayday nu lalangawan migiki. u Kuo-yiw-kun-sin-ye-tin, itida i Si-tu nutipan nu kitidaan a Ci-lung-pu gagagikian "KLPac" atu Pay-sa-luo a Pay-sa-luo gagikian u Ci-lung-puo sasinganganay nu gagikian, picidekan ku katawaan a gagikian, gagikian, dadatukan, kakacuduan, yadah ku nisingan tu tidaay a tuudan atu Tun-na-ya a tuudan nu aadihan. Ci-lung-puo namaka tusepcaytu mihcaan malingatu tu paymihmihcaan a Ya-cu sakatayni nu dadatukan "FMFA", namakacuwacuwaay a tademaw atu kitakiday nu midatukay a tademaw tayni milabu. namahida, Ci-lung-puo tu mihmihcaan sikawaw tu Ma-lay-si-ya kanatal kakanen atu Ci-lung-puo tu dikucan. (MPO), (KLPac) (FMFA), . itida i Dan-ma-lu-lu' a Ma-lay-si-ya kanatal a aadihan tu gagikian kitidaan han makaala tu 5.67 kubu, sibiyaw tu lalangawan kun " Palace of Culture" atu tu-su-kun kanatal. Kuo-cya-se-cie-yi-su-kun u sangan idaw ku laylay a sangan atu aydaay a sangan nu nisikian a waywayan, yadah ku nisingaan tu Ma-lay-si-ya a namaka babalakiay nu nalimaan. nikahidaan nu Kuo-cya-se-cie-yi-su-kun, itida i Ci-lung-puo-cen-cun-cen a Kuo-yiw-yi-su-kun atu itida i Lin-kan-ta-sa' a yi-su'-kun u Ci-lung-puo sasinganganay nu yi-su'-kun. . Ci-lung-puo u Ma-lay-si-ya baluhay a pasingbungay, pabaluhan atu nisabaluhayan nu tatingakuan a tatelungan, paymihcaan idaw ku nipitucek a patinaku tu kanatal natangahan a kawawan "Kreatif.Asia". nika tusepcaycay mihcaan malingatu hiyan nu Ma-lay-si-ya pu'tan ku sapisakawaw. Ci-lung-puo idaw ku tuluay nu dadiputan a kilakilangan, idaw i tatelungan nu macimacian a kahuy kilakilangan nu kitidaan 9.37 kubu, u Ma-lay-si-ya satabalay a kilakilangan nu dadiputan a lalaan, u kitakid nu sumamaday a mahidaay a kilakilangan. liwan han tusa u Pay-he-san kilakilangan nu dadiputan atu Sin-cye-cen kilakilangan nu dadiputan. Pay-he-san dadiputan a niyadu'an patideng tu dada nitida i tuseptucay mihcaan lawpesen ku dadiputan tiya niyadu'an, u Sin-cye-cen kilakilangan a dadiputan nu niyadu'an ku midayliay. uyni dadiputan nu kilakilangan u yadahay nu aadupan a tataydaan mueneng, micidek ku ungaym, kalabaw, sidi, ing-u, kapulus atu ayam. . cyawyi 教育 nitukian nu Ma-lay-si-ya aasipe, Ci-lung-puo tu tusepsepsep mihcaan matinengay tu cudadan makaala tu 97.5%, u Ma-lay-si-ya hamin nu cuo atu niyadu'an ku satalakaway. itida i Ma-lay-si-ya, Ma-lay-yi u kuo-yi, nu mulaay atu sining nu cacudadan a pasubanaan tu kamuan : igu, su'-li a sapasubana' a kamuan. u kuo-min-sin-hua-wen mulaay a cacaudadan atu kuo-min-sin-tan-mi-e mulaay a cacudadan u kamu nu itidaay ku sapasubana' a kamuan. Ci-lung-puo talakaway a cacudadan, anu u kun-li atu se-li talakaway nu cacudadan, u igu ku sapasubana nu kamuan. .

== Ci-long-poo 吉隆坡 == Ci-long-poo itida i Ma-lay-si-ya pangkiw a sobalan notipan a sadipasan,o Sye-lan-e-coo a liklik. Ci-long-poo papikenihen to "Ci-long-poo len-pan ce-sya kitidaan", o Ma-lay-si-ya toloay a len-pan no ce-sya kitidaan, o Ma-lay-si-ya len-pan siho midoi to len-pan ce-sya ko mikowanay. Ci-long-poo naw len-pan siho no tatelongan ato Ma-lay-si-ya len-pan hoing no kitidaan, nika i caysiwsiwsiw mihcaan malimad taydan i Ci-long-poo timolan no tosep a konli no Po'-cen. . ayda no Ma-lay-si-ya a lonem no len-pan sihoan a tapang, sepat to ko liwan itida i Ci-long-poo. Kanahato mahini, Ci-long-poo o Ma-lay-si-ya koo-hoy ato kanatal hong-kon a kitidaan. nika hidaan, kitakid no cacay a bataan no tabakiay a cacakayan no toloay, hekal no satalakaway a Song-ce-ta i Koo-yiw-song-fon-ta, hekal no sakatosa a talakaway i Moo-ti-ka caycaywal ato Ma-lay-si-ya kopiaw cacakayan itida to i labo no Ci-long-poo. . likisi 歷史 katokoh ayda nai' henay ko tatengaan i tini i likisian cimaay hekiya ko patidengan ato panganganay to Ci-long-pooan. Ci-long-poo sayaway naitida i Song-si-e-may ato Song-si-pa-sen a nikalalitemohan, no pinaay no lalomaan ato patiyamay a niyado'an. Ci-long-poo hakiya i caywallimpic mihcaan malamacimacian, tawyaay no Pa-sen a Ma-lay tomok ci La-ze-a-po-to-la itida i sabaan nida ci La-ze-co-ma-an a nipadangan awdan nida ko namakayniay i Lo-ko a tademaw taydan i Pa-sen mikotkot to sikong, ya kakotkotan malatataydaan to papacakayan. no taydaay mikotkot a tademaw i Ci-long-poo kakilokilol sa tayda hida sato a siloma' i An-pan, tida sato mikaykon to pitahawan to kakotkotan. Ci-long-poo o Pa-sen saowac pabaw no sabataday a kitidaan, sakalihalay pakacaw i balongan to toodan, sisa kapolongan no si-kong. Tinipicodohan no nipikotkotan to si-kong, bowah sato ko Ci-long-poo yadah to ko nipisangan to dadanan. . lalangaw nalimaan文化 藝術 Ci-long-poo o Ma-lay-si-ya tatelongan no lalangawan. Ma-lay-si-ya kanatal poo-o-kon itida i Ci-long-poo sakacacay no dadanan, ilabo yadah ko nipisingan to namakacowacowaay a nalimaan ato nikolitan. Ma-lay-si-ya Yi-se-lan lalangawan poo-o-kon pito a malebot no pina ko nipisingan to Yi-se-la a toodan caay kaw nikasingaan to no Cong-ton a nalimaan, paso namaka Ya-coo no domaan a nalimaan, paso Cong-koo ato Tong-nan-ya. nika hida , Ci-long-poo idaw ko pina a poo-o-kan ko patinangkay to nitenonan a toodan, kaysing, mokin a sangan ato nitenonan to dikocan. . mahiniay a poo-o-kon o motidengan a wayway ko patinakoan to noponsi a nitenonan, kaysing, mokin a nalimaan ato nitenona to toodan a hican misanga, likisi, gigico ato nalimaan a toodan. Hong-cya-sye-lan-e itida i Ci-long-poo idaw ko tatelongan no sasalamaan, taydaay midang no tademaw taneng makayda i Hong-cya-sye-lan-e a Si-poo-o-kon, kakolitan ato kakolian micomod miadih. taneng ko taydaay midang no tademaw i Hong-cya-sye-lan-e si pisakakawawan a "The School of Hard Knocks" cacodadan minanam to laylay a toodan ato hicaen misangan to no odip a si no sangaan. "The School of Hard Knocks" . Ci-long-poo sakasingangan no aadihan to migikiay itida i Koo-yiw-song-fong-ta sasa a Ma-lay-si-ya Koo-yiw dadatokan, hina taydaay a masakapotay no midatokay o namakacowacowaay no kitakidan a modatokay no masakapoty a Ma-lay-si-ya Ay-ye-ye-ton "MPO", idaw ko paytem no demiadan itida sikawaw to midatokay ato dayday no lalangawan migiki. o Koo-yiw-kon-sin-ye-tin, itida i Si-to notipan no kitidaan a Ci-long-po gagagikian "KLPac" ato Pay-sa-loo a Pay-sa-loo gagikian o Ci-long-poo sasinganganay no gagikian, picidekan ko katawaan a gagikian, gagikian, dadatokan, kakacodoan, yadah ko nisingan to tidaay a toodan ato Ton-na-ya a toodan no aadihan. Ci-long-poo namaka tosepcayto mihcaan malingato to paymihmihcaan a Ya-co sakatayni no dadatokan "FMFA", namakacowacowaay a tademaw ato kitakiday no midatokay a tademaw tayni milabo. namahida, Ci-long-poo to mihmihcaan sikawaw to Ma-lay-si-ya kanatal kakanen ato Ci-long-poo to dikocan. (MPO), (KLPac) (FMFA), . itida i Dan-ma-lo-lo' a Ma-lay-si-ya kanatal a aadihan to gagikian kitidaan han makaala to 5.67 kobo, sibiyaw to lalangawan kon " Palace of Coltore" ato to-so-kon kanatal. Koo-cya-se-cie-yi-so-kon o sangan idaw ko laylay a sangan ato aydaay a sangan no nisikian a waywayan, yadah ko nisingaan to Ma-lay-si-ya a namaka babalakiay no nalimaan. nikahidaan no Koo-cya-se-cie-yi-so-kon, itida i Ci-long-poo-cen-con-cen a Koo-yiw-yi-so-kon ato itida i Lin-kan-ta-sa' a yi-so'-kon o Ci-long-poo sasinganganay no yi-so'-kon. . Ci-long-poo o Ma-lay-si-ya balohay a pasingbongay, pabalohan ato nisabalohayan no tatingakoan a tatelongan, paymihcaan idaw ko nipitocek a patinako to kanatal natangahan a kawawan "Kreatif.Asia". nika tosepcaycay mihcaan malingato hiyan no Ma-lay-si-ya po'tan ko sapisakawaw. Ci-long-poo idaw ko toloay no dadipotan a kilakilangan, idaw i tatelongan no macimacian a kahoy kilakilangan no kitidaan 9.37 kobo, o Ma-lay-si-ya satabalay a kilakilangan no dadipotan a lalaan, o kitakid no somamaday a mahidaay a kilakilangan. liwan han tosa o Pay-he-san kilakilangan no dadipotan ato Sin-cye-cen kilakilangan no dadipotan. Pay-he-san dadipotan a niyado'an patideng to dada nitida i toseptocay mihcaan lawpesen ko dadipotan tiya niyado'an, o Sin-cye-cen kilakilangan a dadipotan no niyado'an ko midayliay. oyni dadipotan no kilakilangan o yadahay no aadopan a tataydaan moeneng, micidek ko ongaym, kalabaw, sidi, ing-o, kapolos ato ayam. . cyawyi 教育 nitokian no Ma-lay-si-ya aasipe, Ci-long-poo to tosepsepsep mihcaan matinengay to codadan makaala to 97.5%, o Ma-lay-si-ya hamin no coo ato niyado'an ko satalakaway. itida i Ma-lay-si-ya, Ma-lay-yi o koo-yi, no molaay ato sining no cacodadan a pasobanaan to kamoan : igo, so'-li a sapasobana' a kamoan. o koo-min-sin-hoa-wen molaay a cacaodadan ato koo-min-sin-tan-mi-e molaay a cacodadan o kamo no itidaay ko sapasobana' a kamoan. Ci-long-poo talakaway a cacodadan, ano o kon-li ato se-li talakaway no cacodadan, o igo ko sapasobana no kamoan. .
